TextView.android:text: In this game, you must manage resources and make sure that your civilization doesn't perish. Keep your workers alive by making sure that you are providing enough food for them. Make sure to have a standing army so that you can conquer lands and expand your empire. Be careful, if you do not build barracks and stables before you run out of land, you will not be able to create and army

Initial worker cost: 20 food 
Soldier: 10 metal, 10 leather 
Tent: 2 wood, 2 stone, 1 land. Holds 1 worker 
Hut: 20 wood, 10 stone, 2 land. Holds 4 workers 
Cottage: 10 wood, 30 stone, 5 land. Holds 8 workers 
House: 100 wood, 100 stone, 25 land. Holds 50 workers 
Mansion: 200 wood, 200 stone, 50 land. Holds 100 workers 
Barn: 100 wood, 50 stone, 20 land. Holds 200 food 
Wood Stockpile: 100 wood, 50 stone, 25 land. Holds 200 wood
Stone Stockpile: 100 wood, 50 stone, 25 land. Holds 200 stone
Tannery: 30 wood, 70 stone, 1 land, 2 skins. Holds 1 tanner
Smithy: 30 wood, 70 stone, 1 land, 2 ore. Holds 1 blacksmith
Apothecary: 30 wood, 70 stone, 1 land, 2 herbs. Holds 1 healer
Barracks: 60 wood, 120 stone, 20 food, 10 metal, 5 land. Holds 10 soldiers
Stables: 60 wood, 120 stone, 60 food, 10 leather, 5 land. Holds 10 cavalry
